types1:Item.types1:Name: SC-SFDC-SOAP-2
types1:Item.types1:Description: Salesforce SOAP API Connector to create, retrieve, update or delete records, such as accounts, leads, and custom objects. With more than 20 different calls, SOAP API also allows you to maintain passwords, perform searches, and much more.

businessConnector.name: SC-SFDC-SOAP-2
businessConnector.description: Salesforce SOAP API Connector to create, retrieve, update or delete records, such as accounts, leads, and custom objects. With more than 20 different calls, SOAP API also allows you to maintain passwords, perform searches, and much more.

parameter.description: Use Server URL Returned by the Login Response
parameter.name: serverUrl

restSimpleBinding.body:
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Header> <ns:SessionHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:sessionId>{$SessionHeader/sessionId/text()}</ns:sessionId> </ns:SessionHeader> { if (empty($AssignmentRuleHeader)) then () else <ns:AssignmentRuleHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:assignmentRuleId>{$AssignmentRuleHeader/assignmentRuleId/text()}</ns:assignmentRuleId> <ns:useDefaultRule>{$AssignmentRuleHeader/useDefaultRule/text()}</ns:useDefaultRule> </ns:AssignmentRuleHeader> } { if (empty($MruHeader)) then () else <ns:MruHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:updateMru>{$MruHeader/updateMru/text()}</ns:updateMru> </ns:MruHeader> } { if (empty($AllowFieldTruncationHeader)) then () else <ns:AllowFieldTruncationHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:allowFieldTruncation>{$AllowFieldTruncationHeader/allowFieldTruncation/text()}</ns:allowFieldTruncation> </ns:AllowFieldTruncationHeader> } { if (empty($DisableFeedTrackingHeader)) then () else <ns:DisableFeedTrackingHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:disableFeedTracking>{$DisableFeedTrackingHeader/disableFeedTracking/text()}</ns:disableFeedTracking> </ns:DisableFeedTrackingHeader> } { if (empty($StreamingEnabledHeader)) then () else <ns:StreamingEnabledHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:streamingEnabled>{$StreamingEnabledHeader/streamingEnabled/text()}</ns:streamingEnabled> </ns:StreamingEnabledHeader> } { if (empty($AllOrNoneHeader)) then () else <ns:AllOrNoneHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:allOrNone>{$AllOrNoneHeader/allOrNone/text()}</ns:allOrNone> </ns:AllOrNoneHeader> } { if (empty($DuplicateRuleHeader)) then () else <ns:DuplicateRuleHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:allowSave>{$DuplicateRuleHeader/allowSave/text()}</ns:allowSave> <ns:includeRecordDetails>{$DuplicateRuleHeader/includeRecordDetails/text()}</ns:includeRecordDetails> <ns:runAsCurrentUser>{$DuplicateRuleHeader/runAsCurrentUser/text()}</ns:runAsCurrentUser> </ns:DuplicateRuleHeader> } { if (empty($LocaleOptions)) then () else <ns:LocaleOptions xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:language>{$LocaleOptions/language/text()}</ns:language> <ns:localizeErrors>{$LocaleOptions/localizeErrors/text()}</ns:localizeErrors> </ns:LocaleOptions> } { if (empty($DebuggingHeader)) then () else <ns:DebuggingHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com">
{ for $categories in $DebuggingHeader/categories
return <ns:categories> <ns:category>{$categories/category/text()}</ns:category> <ns:level>{$categories/level/text()}</ns:level> </ns:categories>
} <ns:debugLevel>{$DebuggingHeader/debugLevel/text()}</ns:debugLevel> </ns:DebuggingHeader> } { if (empty($PackageVersionHeader)) then () else <ns:PackageVersionHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com">
{ for $packageVersions in $PackageVersionHeader/packageVersions
return <ns:packageVersions> <ns:majorNumber>{$packageVersions/majorNumber/text()}</ns:majorNumber> <ns:minorNumber>{$packageVersions/minorNumber/text()}</ns:minorNumber> <ns:namespace>{$packageVersions/namespace/text()}</ns:namespace> </ns:packageVersions>
} </ns:PackageVersionHeader> } { if (empty($EmailHeader)) then () else <ns:EmailHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:triggerAutoResponseEmail>{$EmailHeader/triggerAutoResponseEmail/text()}</ns:triggerAutoResponseEmail> <ns:triggerOtherEmail>{$EmailHeader/triggerOtherEmail/text()}</ns:triggerOtherEmail> <ns:triggerUserEmail>{$EmailHeader/triggerUserEmail/text()}</ns:triggerUserEmail> </ns:EmailHeader> }
</soap:Header> <soap:Body> <ns:create xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> { for $sObjects in $create/sObjects return <ns:sObjects xsi:type="{concat('sf:',$sObjects/xsiType/text())}"> { for $fieldsToNull in $sObjects/fieldsToNull return <ns1:fieldsToNull xmlns:ns1="urn:sobject.enterprise.soap.sforce.com">{$fieldsToNull/text()}</ns1:fieldsToNull> }
{ for $element in $sObjects/* where not(matches(local-name($element),"fieldsToNull|xsiType")) return $element } </ns:sObjects> }
</ns:create> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Header> <ns:SessionHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:sessionId>{$SessionHeader/sessionId/text()}</ns:sessionId> </ns:SessionHeader> { if (empty($AssignmentRuleHeader)) then () else <ns:AssignmentRuleHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:assignmentRuleId>{$AssignmentRuleHeader/assignmentRuleId/text()}</ns:assignmentRuleId> <ns:useDefaultRule>{$AssignmentRuleHeader/useDefaultRule/text()}</ns:useDefaultRule> </ns:AssignmentRuleHeader> } { if (empty($MruHeader)) then () else <ns:MruHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:updateMru>{$MruHeader/updateMru/text()}</ns:updateMru> </ns:MruHeader> } { if (empty($AllowFieldTruncationHeader)) then () else <ns:AllowFieldTruncationHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:allowFieldTruncation>{$AllowFieldTruncationHeader/allowFieldTruncation/text()}</ns:allowFieldTruncation> </ns:AllowFieldTruncationHeader> } { if (empty($DisableFeedTrackingHeader)) then () else <ns:DisableFeedTrackingHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:disableFeedTracking>{$DisableFeedTrackingHeader/disableFeedTracking/text()}</ns:disableFeedTracking> </ns:DisableFeedTrackingHeader> } { if (empty($StreamingEnabledHeader)) then () else <ns:StreamingEnabledHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:streamingEnabled>{$StreamingEnabledHeader/streamingEnabled/text()}</ns:streamingEnabled> </ns:StreamingEnabledHeader> } { if (empty($AllOrNoneHeader)) then () else <ns:AllOrNoneHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:allOrNone>{$AllOrNoneHeader/allOrNone/text()}</ns:allOrNone> </ns:AllOrNoneHeader> } { if (empty($DuplicateRuleHeader)) then () else <ns:DuplicateRuleHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:allowSave>{$DuplicateRuleHeader/allowSave/text()}</ns:allowSave> <ns:includeRecordDetails>{$DuplicateRuleHeader/includeRecordDetails/text()}</ns:includeRecordDetails> <ns:runAsCurrentUser>{$DuplicateRuleHeader/runAsCurrentUser/text()}</ns:runAsCurrentUser> </ns:DuplicateRuleHeader> } { if (empty($LocaleOptions)) then () else <ns:LocaleOptions xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:language>{$LocaleOptions/language/text()}</ns:language> <ns:localizeErrors>{$LocaleOptions/localizeErrors/text()}</ns:localizeErrors> </ns:LocaleOptions> } { if (empty($DebuggingHeader)) then () else <ns:DebuggingHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> { for $categories in $DebuggingHeader/categories return <ns:categories> <ns:category>{$categories/category/text()}</ns:category> <ns:level>{$categories/level/text()}</ns:level> </ns:categories> } <ns:debugLevel>{$DebuggingHeader/debugLevel/text()}</ns:debugLevel> </ns:DebuggingHeader> } { if (empty($PackageVersionHeader)) then () else <ns:PackageVersionHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> { for $packageVersions in $PackageVersionHeader/packageVersions return <ns:packageVersions> <ns:majorNumber>{$packageVersions/majorNumber/text()}</ns:majorNumber> <ns:minorNumber>{$packageVersions/minorNumber/text()}</ns:minorNumber> <ns:namespace>{$packageVersions/namespace/text()}</ns:namespace> </ns:packageVersions> } </ns:PackageVersionHeader> } { if (empty($EmailHeader)) then () else <ns:EmailHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:triggerAutoResponseEmail>{$EmailHeader/triggerAutoResponseEmail/text()}</ns:triggerAutoResponseEmail> <ns:triggerOtherEmail>{$EmailHeader/triggerOtherEmail/text()}</ns:triggerOtherEmail> <ns:triggerUserEmail>{$EmailHeader/triggerUserEmail/text()}</ns:triggerUserEmail> </ns:EmailHeader> } { if (empty($OwnerChangeOptions)) then () else <ns:OwnerChangeOptions xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> { for $options in $OwnerChangeOptions/options return <ns:options> <ns:type>{$options/type/text()}</ns:type> <ns:execute>{$options/execute/text()}</ns:execute> </ns:options> } </ns:OwnerChangeOptions> } </soap:Header> <soap:Body> <ns:update xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> { for $sObjects in $update/sObjects return <ns:sObjects xsi:type="{concat('sf:',$sObjects/xsiType/text())}"> { for $fieldsToNull in $sObjects/fieldsToNull return <ns1:fieldsToNull xmlns:ns1="urn:sobject.enterprise.soap.sforce.com">{$fieldsToNull/text()}</ns1:fieldsToNull> } { for $element in $sObjects/* where not(matches(local-name($element),"fieldsToNull|xsiType")) return $element } </ns:sObjects> } </ns:update> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

parameter.name: query
parameter.testWith: <Query_AnonymousType> <queryString> SELECT ID, Name ,accountid FROM contact where accountid='0016F00002R2wAL' </queryString> </Query_AnonymousType>

parameter.name: queryAll
parameter.testWith: <QueryAll_AnonymousType> <queryString> SELECT Id, isDeleted, Name from Account where isDeleted = true </queryString> </QueryAll_AnonymousType>

restSimpleBinding.body: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Header> <ns:SessionHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:sessionId>{$SessionHeader/sessionId/text()}</ns:sessionId> </ns:SessionHeader> { if (empty($PackageVersionHeader)) then () else <ns:PackageVersionHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> { for $packageVersions in $PackageVersionHeader/packageVersions return <ns:packageVersions> <ns:majorNumber>{$packageVersions/majorNumber/text()}</ns:majorNumber> <ns:minorNumber>{$packageVersions/minorNumber/text()}</ns:minorNumber> <ns:namespace>{$packageVersions/namespace/text()}</ns:namespace> </ns:packageVersions> } </ns:PackageVersionHeader> } </soap:Header> <soap:Body> <ns:search xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:searchString>{$search/searchString/text()}</ns:searchString> </ns:search> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Header> <ns:SessionHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:sessionId>{$SessionHeader/sessionId/text()}</ns:sessionId> </ns:SessionHeader> { if (empty($AssignmentRuleHeader)) then () else <ns:AssignmentRuleHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:assignmentRuleId>{$AssignmentRuleHeader/assignmentRuleId/text()}</ns:assignmentRuleId> <ns:useDefaultRule>{$AssignmentRuleHeader/useDefaultRule/text()}</ns:useDefaultRule> </ns:AssignmentRuleHeader> } { if (empty($MruHeader)) then () else <ns:MruHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:updateMru>{$MruHeader/updateMru/text()}</ns:updateMru> </ns:MruHeader> } { if (empty($AllowFieldTruncationHeader)) then () else <ns:AllowFieldTruncationHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:allowFieldTruncation>{$AllowFieldTruncationHeader/allowFieldTruncation/text()}</ns:allowFieldTruncation> </ns:AllowFieldTruncationHeader> } { if (empty($DisableFeedTrackingHeader)) then () else <ns:DisableFeedTrackingHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:disableFeedTracking>{$DisableFeedTrackingHeader/disableFeedTracking/text()}</ns:disableFeedTracking> </ns:DisableFeedTrackingHeader> } { if (empty($StreamingEnabledHeader)) then () else <ns:StreamingEnabledHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:streamingEnabled>{$StreamingEnabledHeader/streamingEnabled/text()}</ns:streamingEnabled> </ns:StreamingEnabledHeader> } { if (empty($AllOrNoneHeader)) then () else <ns:AllOrNoneHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:allOrNone>{$AllOrNoneHeader/allOrNone/text()}</ns:allOrNone> </ns:AllOrNoneHeader> } { if (empty($DuplicateRuleHeader)) then () else <ns:DuplicateRuleHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:allowSave>{$DuplicateRuleHeader/allowSave/text()}</ns:allowSave> <ns:includeRecordDetails>{$DuplicateRuleHeader/includeRecordDetails/text()}</ns:includeRecordDetails> <ns:runAsCurrentUser>{$DuplicateRuleHeader/runAsCurrentUser/text()}</ns:runAsCurrentUser> </ns:DuplicateRuleHeader> } { if (empty($LocaleOptions)) then () else <ns:LocaleOptions xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:language>{$LocaleOptions/language/text()}</ns:language> <ns:localizeErrors>{$LocaleOptions/localizeErrors/text()}</ns:localizeErrors> </ns:LocaleOptions> } { if (empty($DebuggingHeader)) then () else <ns:DebuggingHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com">
{ for $categories in $DebuggingHeader/categories
return <ns:categories> <ns:category>{$categories/category/text()}</ns:category> <ns:level>{$categories/level/text()}</ns:level> </ns:categories>
} <ns:debugLevel>{$DebuggingHeader/debugLevel/text()}</ns:debugLevel> </ns:DebuggingHeader> } { if (empty($PackageVersionHeader)) then () else <ns:PackageVersionHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com">
{ for $packageVersions in $PackageVersionHeader/packageVersions
return <ns:packageVersions> <ns:majorNumber>{$packageVersions/majorNumber/text()}</ns:majorNumber> <ns:minorNumber>{$packageVersions/minorNumber/text()}</ns:minorNumber> <ns:namespace>{$packageVersions/namespace/text()}</ns:namespace> </ns:packageVersions>
} </ns:PackageVersionHeader> } { if (empty($EmailHeader)) then () else <ns:EmailHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:triggerAutoResponseEmail>{$EmailHeader/triggerAutoResponseEmail/text()}</ns:triggerAutoResponseEmail> <ns:triggerOtherEmail>{$EmailHeader/triggerOtherEmail/text()}</ns:triggerOtherEmail> <ns:triggerUserEmail>{$EmailHeader/triggerUserEmail/text()}</ns:triggerUserEmail> </ns:EmailHeader> }
</soap:Header> <soap:Body> <ns:delete xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> { for $ids in $delete/ids return <ns:ids>{$ids/text()}</ns:ids> }
</ns:delete> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Header> <ns:SessionHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:sessionId>{$SessionHeader/sessionId/text()}</ns:sessionId> </ns:SessionHeader> { if (empty($AssignmentRuleHeader)) then () else <ns:AssignmentRuleHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:assignmentRuleId>{$AssignmentRuleHeader/assignmentRuleId/text()}</ns:assignmentRuleId> <ns:useDefaultRule>{$AssignmentRuleHeader/useDefaultRule/text()}</ns:useDefaultRule> </ns:AssignmentRuleHeader> } { if (empty($MruHeader)) then () else <ns:MruHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:updateMru>{$MruHeader/updateMru/text()}</ns:updateMru> </ns:MruHeader> } { if (empty($AllowFieldTruncationHeader)) then () else <ns:AllowFieldTruncationHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:allowFieldTruncation>{$AllowFieldTruncationHeader/allowFieldTruncation/text()}</ns:allowFieldTruncation> </ns:AllowFieldTruncationHeader> } { if (empty($DisableFeedTrackingHeader)) then () else <ns:DisableFeedTrackingHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:disableFeedTracking>{$DisableFeedTrackingHeader/disableFeedTracking/text()}</ns:disableFeedTracking> </ns:DisableFeedTrackingHeader> } { if (empty($StreamingEnabledHeader)) then () else <ns:StreamingEnabledHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:streamingEnabled>{$StreamingEnabledHeader/streamingEnabled/text()}</ns:streamingEnabled> </ns:StreamingEnabledHeader> } { if (empty($AllOrNoneHeader)) then () else <ns:AllOrNoneHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:allOrNone>{$AllOrNoneHeader/allOrNone/text()}</ns:allOrNone> </ns:AllOrNoneHeader> } { if (empty($DuplicateRuleHeader)) then () else <ns:DuplicateRuleHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:allowSave>{$DuplicateRuleHeader/allowSave/text()}</ns:allowSave> <ns:includeRecordDetails>{$DuplicateRuleHeader/includeRecordDetails/text()}</ns:includeRecordDetails> <ns:runAsCurrentUser>{$DuplicateRuleHeader/runAsCurrentUser/text()}</ns:runAsCurrentUser> </ns:DuplicateRuleHeader> } { if (empty($LocaleOptions)) then () else <ns:LocaleOptions xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:language>{$LocaleOptions/language/text()}</ns:language> <ns:localizeErrors>{$LocaleOptions/localizeErrors/text()}</ns:localizeErrors> </ns:LocaleOptions> } { if (empty($DebuggingHeader)) then () else <ns:DebuggingHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> { for $categories in $DebuggingHeader/categories return <ns:categories> <ns:category>{$categories/category/text()}</ns:category> <ns:level>{$categories/level/text()}</ns:level> </ns:categories> } <ns:debugLevel>{$DebuggingHeader/debugLevel/text()}</ns:debugLevel> </ns:DebuggingHeader> } { if (empty($PackageVersionHeader)) then () else <ns:PackageVersionHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> { for $packageVersions in $PackageVersionHeader/packageVersions return <ns:packageVersions> <ns:majorNumber>{$packageVersions/majorNumber/text()}</ns:majorNumber> <ns:minorNumber>{$packageVersions/minorNumber/text()}</ns:minorNumber> <ns:namespace>{$packageVersions/namespace/text()}</ns:namespace> </ns:packageVersions> } </ns:PackageVersionHeader> } { if (empty($EmailHeader)) then () else <ns:EmailHeader xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:triggerAutoResponseEmail>{$EmailHeader/triggerAutoResponseEmail/text()}</ns:triggerAutoResponseEmail> <ns:triggerOtherEmail>{$EmailHeader/triggerOtherEmail/text()}</ns:triggerOtherEmail> <ns:triggerUserEmail>{$EmailHeader/triggerUserEmail/text()}</ns:triggerUserEmail> </ns:EmailHeader> } { if (empty($OwnerChangeOptions)) then () else <ns:OwnerChangeOptions xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> { for $options in $OwnerChangeOptions/options return <ns:options> <ns:type>{$options/type/text()}</ns:type> <ns:execute>{$options/execute/text()}</ns:execute> </ns:options> } </ns:OwnerChangeOptions> } </soap:Header> <soap:Body> <ns:upsert xmlns:ns="urn:enterprise.soap.sforce.com"> <ns:externalIDFieldName>{$upsert/externalIDFieldName/text()}</ns:externalIDFieldName> { for $sObjects in $upsert/sObjects return <ns:sObjects xsi:type="{concat('sf:',$sObjects/xsiType/text())}"> { for $fieldsToNull in $sObjects/fieldsToNull return <ns1:fieldsToNull xmlns:ns1="urn:sobject.enterprise.soap.sforce.com">{$fieldsToNull/text()}</ns1:fieldsToNull> } { for $element in $sObjects/* where not(matches(local-name($element),"fieldsToNull|xsiType")) return $element } </ns:sObjects> } </ns:upsert> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
